body_html: @soumith, @apaszke - It will be nice if the build script is available. We would like to build a PyTorch wheel by pinning the master branch to a certain commit, and using this for CI testing in Pyro. This will greatly help us migrate distributions, and test the integration on the Pyro side.

body: @soumith, @apaszke - It will be nice if the build script is available. We would like to build a PyTorch wheel by pinning the master branch to a certain commit, and using this for CI testing in Pyro. This will greatly help us migrate distributions, and test the integration on the Pyro side.
